snippet.title: Commodore C64 - Gremlins (1984)
snippet.description:
DESCRIPTION
This cute little fellow looks like the ideal pet, right? Wrong! As a Modwai, he's sweet and cuddly. But just feed him after midnight and watch him turn into a Gremlin--otherwise known as a monster! Not since Dr. Jeckyll and Mr. Hyde has there been such a charming/dangerous character. Or is that characters?
